resources.string: a different operating system from your current one.
an older version of your current operating system.
Error downloading config file. Link used:
Developer mode enabled for this session
This update will erase all your data.
This update will erase all your data.\nDo you want to continue?
The file you\'re trying to download is too large for mobile connections (~100MB). Please enable Wi-Fi connection and try again.
Fairphone Updater could not obtain the necessary permissions to install Google Apps. If you chose DENY, please restart the installer and select ALLOW and REMEMBER CHOICE FOREVER.

For the full Android and Google mobile experience like the app store, your phone needs extra content and software. Unfortunately, as Fairphone doesn\'t have a license yet, we cannot pre-install this content, nor can we provide it directly ourselves. We are working with the content owner to achieve this.\nPress « I Agree » below to download this content from an external secured source. Installing this content is your own responsibility.\nIf you do not agree, your phone will still work with basic Android apps, of course, but you will miss some services from Google.
Error downloading files, please try again.
Fairphone Updater will now ask you for Superuser access. We assure you it\'s perfectly safe. Please choose ALLOW and REMEMBER CHOICE FOREVER when asked.
The system needs to reboot to complete the installation.\n\nAfter the reboot, follow the steps to set up Google Apps.
Google Apps are installed. Could not reboot device, please reboot manually.
To reinstall the app store on your phone, press and hold the Home screen, press the Widgets icon, search for the Google Apps Installer widget and drag it to your Home screen and select it.
Fairphone Updater is updating your operating system in the background. Please try again later.
It\'s important that you keep in mind that installing other operating systems will change the user experience.
No space available on SD card.
Are you sure you want to continue?
I know and understand all implications of performing this installation
The update has started. This may take some time depending on your network connection speed.
Restart your phone to complete the update.
Google Apps installation is occurring in the background. Please try again later.
The file you\'re trying to download is too large for mobile connections (~200MB). Please enable Wi-Fi connection and try again.

This Android for Fairphone operating system has an extra layer of Fairphone flavor with features like the Peace of Mind widget, Edge Swipe, and the Last Used / Most Used Apps widget.\n\nWe recommend installing Android for Fairphone on your device to have the best Fairphone experience.
This Stock Android operating system is the pure Android experience without any additional Fairphone modifications.
